nodes.bodyText: This is not problematic, per-se, but consider replacing with a constant time value to make the test deterministic
The value of this timestamp isn't important for this test, we just need one.

These two lines are fine! -- but I think this is where there's an opportunity to instead of calling reportPersistence and passing in a currentSessionId, making a per session-id object that gets persisted by these calls.
Yup, let's chat more about this.
